title: League of Legends: The Movie
body: After seeing all the new videos riot has been comming up with, such as get jinxed, the cinematic trailer, and even the new contact with velkoz video, I think it would be a great idea for riot to invest on making a movie. Ofcourse this is only a suggestion and i have no idea how to go about making a movie (that would be riots job), but i think it would be a great idea for many reasons. It can bring more popularity to the game as well as earn riot a good amount of money for improvements ect. such as the NA server atm :P anyway i think itd be great to see what riot could come up with in making a movie. I mean the cinematic trailer was great. All they need to do is make a two hour version!Jk. Well, thats my suggestion.

replies.body: Here's my take.. I think we need vignettes. Honestly, cramming that many characters into one or even a few movies would be damn near impossible. Not everyone knows each other. You might not even be able to make stuff work considering how large the world is. What might work is telling a story of a group of characters, maybe along faction lines, or geographical locations. Stories the revolve around the Piltover/Zaun relationship, Demacia/Noxus, or the whole of Mt Targon. These sort of regional stories might best serve a way to really explore the world without needed to basically have the Avengers X 50.

Please more of this. With the Journal of Justice gone, the lore-hounds out there (like myself) are dying for actual chunks of goodness outside of individual champion lore. Anything that the lore team can throw at us is appreciated and loved!

I feel ya. I think there's a bunch of stuff being explored in terms of story delivery. Everything from the Jinx video, to the Lucian login, to the Vel'koz promo is proof of things coming out of experimentation and into implementation. I think our ways to deliver story will only grow from here :)

I just want actual stories back. The jinx log in is great, but I didn't get anything from it other than 'Jinx is crazy, is good at machines, and likes explosions.' Why does Sivir have something against Cass? For what reason did we retcon everything so everyone is from runeterra? Are we EVER going to find General Du Couteau?

The General is dead. It was implied in the Talon teaser image. You can see Swain's bird and some black roses, referencing "The Black Rose", they assassinated him. That is why Talon joined the League. To follow Swain and LeBlanc.

And The Void is technically another world, so there are several champs from there. Nasus and Renekton are from some desert world (un-named).

The Runeterra retcon I saw as a sad necessity. Having characters from a hundred different worlds is nice, but when you have everyone from one continent with a few out-lying champions, then you can better develop the regions those people come from. Through the champions, you can understand the cities that they are supposed to represent.

And I'm sure I am not the only one who will be waiting eagerly but patiently! XD

I can see login vids being an easily recurring outlet, but is there anything on the drawing board along those lines (videos) for already released champions? Would love to see some lore love to Renekton/Nasus!

I was close... but then the parrot comes D: (*nice of you to drop by though*)

I will concede that shorter vignettes are probably the best option. Not every story and lore piece can be feature length and vignettes can be pumped out in more a more timely fashion.

But who knows? Maybe play certain vignettes in order and you might just get a LoL movie out it (*maybe an awkwardly spliced one with some scenes missing, but it could work*).

Also when I think League vignettes, I'm reminded of those Heritage Minutes growing up and it's putting a big smile on my face thinking about it more.
well vignetes wouldnt do the trick in attracting popularity or raising money

Maybe not in the numbers you're thinking of like at the box office, but maybe they can lead up to that.

I think in my first post I said there could be a lot to take out of context with a League movie straight out of the gate. Maybe the vignettes can help? Draw enough interest with vignettes, make sure there enough people interested in the lore and the world, then crank the production to 11 for the big budget blockbuster.

Maybe something like demacian justice against the threat from the void or something? Well there's a world of possibilities!!! Or maybe there can be a great war between the lands and take it from there... Not sure like I said there's lots of room to improvise.
I say  to make it of how everything stared how they all meet each other of why some became rivals and to have Love parts in it too :3

As long as Viktor makes a cameo in which he does something of unprecedented bad-assery, I'd support it.

No making him the main villain, though. We all know how that ends (beaten by a guy with a hammer). Make him a supporting character (ally or enemy) who can score a viktory or two, before going back to whatever it is Viktor does on a day to day basis.

Isuke's first idea for a LoL movie could work like the film Gladiator. Just maybe a lot to take out of context for the general public.

If LoL were to make a movie, my best guess for a first outing world be that it's a world building high fantasy with Noxus vs. Demacia/Noxus vs. Ionia. Problem I see with this is that it would only cover a *small faction* or League's setting and charm.

Only real remedy to that would be to make League of Legends ***movies*** (*As if one League movie wasn't daunting enough* :S).
Personally, I think maybe a buddy cop movie with Vi and Cait could be fun. Also the Freljord conflict filmed in the style of Romance of the Three Kingdoms or Game of Thrones might work.
I don't want a movie. I want a weekly one hour episode series.
The movie could have nothing to do with the champ and just be in the universe, like the main character could be {{champion:55}} 's dad and how he disappear or something like that
Maybe not movie length, but I would like to see more than just teasers... maybe around 30 minute shorts? That way they can get in a good amount of story line

well it could be kind of like the cinematic trailer where you know its all the fights.. or it could be like a tournament within the league and like all the champs join and make teams and fight off eachother or it could be something more like battle of the lands like demacia and noxus and all of that... idk it could be so many different things!
